constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 153 (Thursday, September 22, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KILMER:
H.R. 8967.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 1 provides Congress with the
power to ``lay and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts and
Excises'' in order to ``provide for the . . . general Welfare
of the United States.''
[Page H8114]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

title: Puyallup Tribe of Indians Land Into Trust Confirmation Act of 2022
